hypothesis: Using the same translation backoff schedule but with random translation instead of deterministic will clarify whether gains are due to the schedule itself or the deterministic cycling.
modification: Apply random 2-pixel translation for epochs 0–6, then turn off translation after epoch 7, using the same backoff schedule but with deterministic_translate=false.
description: Control experiment for deterministic_translate_backoff. Uses the same backoff schedule (translation on for early epochs, off later), but sets deterministic_translate=false so that the loader uses standard random translation rather than deterministic grouped translation. This helps disentangle the effect of the backoff schedule from the effect of deterministic translation.
